title: Cant play games
body:
Everytime i try to start a game and play it just takes me to the reconnect screen, and everytime i hit reconnect it "loads" for 1 second then nothing happens and i have to reconnect again. I cant play at all and I have no idea why

Edit: my league works again after updating drivers and re installing

replies.body: I agree with Postal Twinkie that checking your firewall settings can help, as this seems like a network issue failing to reach the game server.  I actually suggest combing through the entirety of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities there.  I hope that helps!
it still doesnt work and i've tried adding permissions and disabling my firewall, I've had the new client since it came out but this problem only started happening today

It sounds like you may have a stuck League process and there are two ways to handle it. 

You can restart your system and it should clear it just fine or you can Three-Finger-Salute (Alt+Cntrl+Del) go to Task Manager > click 'More Details' in the window that pops up. In the 'Process' tab look for League of Legends entries, click on them, and then click 'End Task'.

EDIT:

You may also be having an issue with Anti-Virus or Firewall settings. Some people have experienced the need to reset their firewall permissions with the new client. 

Here is a link; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-windows

Also a video. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GyJisyEQ248
